name: Community Chest
projectInfo: Community-Chest allows users to create, maintain and update community fridges in their neighborhoods with items from fresh produce to home-cooked meals — along with sanitary products and other health-related supplies to those in need, no questions asked.

name: Password Generator
projectInfo: This application allows users to generate passwords that they select based on requirement criteria of length, type-case, special characters, and number.

name: Tradecraft Messages
projectInfo: Tradecraft allows users to communicate messages to one another and delete the message’s instance, allowing conversations between them to remain private and secure.

name: Promethium
projectInfo: Promethium allows users to create, view, update and delete the contents of their closets. Users are also able to build outfits based on the garments in their closets.

name: 5 Day Weather Tracker
projectInfo: 5 Day Weather App gives users real-time weather info. Users can enter any city and see the weather conditions for that location. Users are also able to save locations for future viewing.

name: Travel Budget
projectInfo: Travel Budget allows users to track their budgets and provides offline access and functionality.
